articles.description: Thousands of Easter eggs will be falling from the sky on April 3 as part of a Durham church's Easter celebration.
articles.content:
By Sarah Lindenfeld Hall, Go Ask Mom editor
Durham, N.C. — Thousands of Easter eggs will be falling from the sky on April 3 as part of a Durham church's Easter celebration.
During EGGstravaganza, 1… [+515 chars]
